message.body: Hey did u get tix yet for Butch? I haven't had a chance to listen to Ryan Adams yet but I'd really like to see Butch again.
Yup. Got a ticket with your name on it :)
Awesome! Let me know how much and I'll give u cash this week. Maybe we can work it in with the walk too.
Can you do Tuesday? Have plans tomorrow and headed to DC wed-fri

Cool. It's $80 a ticket - I know it's a lot. Ryan Adams always sells out so they jack the prices. I bought the tickets fully prepared to cover the cost myself though, so I'm fine with whatever you're comfortable paying! Seriously. Butch is only opening, so 25% of ticket cost? :)
No worries. I'll give u the $80. I'm looking forward to it!
